meanings.definition: Of or relating to the shortest line between two points on a curved surface.
meanings.sent1: The geodesic path on the globe is the quickest route between two cities.
meanings.sent2: The geodesic measurements helped in determining the most direct path across the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The geodesic shortcut through the park saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent4: Her geodesic thinking led her to find the most efficient solution to the problem.
meanings.sent5: The geodesic road sign pointed travelers in the right direction.

meanings.definition: A line representing the shortest distance between two points on a curved surface.
meanings.sent1: The geodesic on the map showed the quickest way to reach the destination.
meanings.sent2: The geodesic drawn on the globe connected the two cities efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The geodesic in the maze guided us to the exit without any wrong turns.
meanings.sent4: The geodesic in their relationship kept them close despite the distance.
meanings.sent5: The geodesic rope bridge spanned the river with precision.
